casebody.data:
The BARNEY G. JOYNER FAMILY TRUST, a North Carolina trust, David Lee Joyner, individually and as co-trustee and co-beneficiary of the Barney G. Joyner Family Trust, Phyllis M. Joyner, individually and as co-trustee and co-beneficiary of the Barney G. Joyner Family Trust, and Phyllis Joyner Chappell, individually and as co-trustee and co-beneficiary of the Barney G. Joyner Family Trust, Plaintiffs,
v.
Carolyn Joyner DRIGGERS, individually and as co-trustee and co-beneficiary of the Barney G. Joyner Family Trust, William E. Driggers, Jr., Appletree Daycare, Inc., and Appletree Child Development Center, Inc., Defendants.
and
Carolyn Joyner Driggers, individually and as co-trustee and co-beneficiary of the Barney G. Joyner Family Trust, Third-Party Plaintiff,
v.
David Lee Joyner, individually and as trustee, co-trustee, and attorney-in-fact for the trustees of the Barney G. Joyner Family Trust, and as Executor of the Estate of Barney G. Joyner, and as attorney-in-fact for Phyllis M. Joyner, and Ronald Dorrestein, individually and in his capacity as attorney for the Barney G. Joyner Family Trust and the Estate of Barney G. Joyner, Third-Party Defendants. No. COA15-1017. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Feb. 16, 2016.

Case Reported Without Published Opinion

Dismissed as moot.
